title: ISic004391. Sikel funerary inscription
body:
Facsimile Images

αδαιοι

Apparatus criticus

Text after Orsi

translation

commentary

the sole record of this text is the note by Orsi in the inventory to ISic003363 (Museo P.Orsi inv. 41697), recording it alongside that piece, but noting that it was not recovered. Paino transcribes Orsi's report and drawing

bibliography

  • Paino 1958 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002613
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
